title: Looking for low grade SGC HOFERS
author: Bruinsfan94

posts.post_title: Looking for low grade SGC HOFERS
posts.post_content:
I've been working on a t206 hofer project and would like to add some more. Goal right now for the most part is to get one of each HOFer in the set. Greatly prefer SGC graded but would consider PSA/BVG/GIA/Raw for the right deal. I want the grade range to be A-2 for the most part. I'm looking for these players, for the most part, the variation does not matter for players with more then one card in the set:

Baker
Brown
Chance
Clarke
Cobb
Collins
Duffy
Evers
Flick
Griffth
Jennings
Johnson
Keeler
Lajoie
Marqaurd
McGraw
Speaker
Tinker
Wallace

Here is a Marquard that I have available.  Email me at bdbrownbaseball@gmail if you are interested.  Thanks, Bill

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=263466&d=1488127156[/IMG]
I also a Baker SGC 40.  Email me at [url]bdbrownbaseball@gmail.com[/url].  Thanks, Bill

I have an SGC 3.5 Frank Chance "Batting" with an Old Mill back I could part with. 
 [url]rwtzero3@gmail.com[/url]
Bump. Still looking,knocked another off the other day. Looking for SGC or even PSA A-2. Looking to pay around Ebay prices.Got paypal ready.
Still looking. Added a couple more from a board member last night.
